humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, multiple left axillary sentinel lymph nodes (No.1 and No.2) and multiple (3) left axillary lymph nodes were excised and found to be negative for tumor. Cytokeratin immunostains confirmed the H&E impression. Therefore, based on the new rules 10 and 11, the N stage for this patient is N0, as there is no metastatic carcinoma in sentinel lymph nodes and regional lymph nodes, and all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that multiple (2) left axillary sentinel lymph nodes are negative for tumor and multiple (3) left axillary lymph nodes are also negative for tumor. This indicates that there is no regional lymph node metastasis, which corresponds to a pathologic N stage of N0.
